sentences: Tähe absoluutne heledus on määratud 10 parseki kaugusel.
Maa asub päikesest teistel mehi kaugusel.
context: In Estonian, 'kaugusel' is the adessive case form of the word 'kaugus' which means 'distance'. The suffix '-el' indicates location or position at a distance. It's used to express that something is located at a certain distance from a reference point or observer.
